A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really miss the old Star Wars men. I love having a strong female as the lead\, but felt the male characters were emasculated somehow. Kylo Ren should make men and women tremble before him\, but he just comes off like a spoiled child throwing a tantrum. Luke is too old not to have it more together\, and Poe and Finn seem more like teenagers than grown men. It wasn't terrible\, but it should have been so much more.
